Class GuestServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.erahotel.era_backend.service.impl.GuestServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuestService
@Service public class GuestServiceImpl extends Object implements GuestService
Implementation of the GuestService interface.

Provides business logic for managing guests, including creation, retrieval, updating, and deletion. Uses GuestRepository for data access and GuestMapper for entity-DTO conversion.

Author:
Alwin Roble
See Also:
  • GuestService
  • GuestRepository
  • GuestMapper
